channel.title: NEEED HELP! please at least try to help
channel.description: Ok I have easyRSC and I extracted it for now I want to just play it alone but idk how. i have 3 choices distributed client,client,and server which do i do? any time i click run on client and server it just opens up the command prompt and then closes and if I do distributed it loads and I get the log in screen but wen I type in a user name and password it just says sorry can't connect check internet settings. Am i doing something wrong? please someone help me i'm in need of help baad! :confused:

item.title: NEEED HELP! please at least try to help
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:7, topic:332251”]server.java add ur 192.168.1.XXX address

client- settings.ini enter in your ip.

or u can just put local host in as both of em[/quote]

And make sure you compile after changing the Server.java

Read full topic
item.source: NEEED HELP! please at least try to help
